thread.section_title: American Freight Furniture & Mattress Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of American Freight Furniture & Mattress | americanfreight.us | 7 of 79
thread.title: Philip
thread.title_full: American Freight Furniture & Mattress reviewed by Philip

author: Philip
title: Philip
text: I purchased a set of tables that were not delivered to me on the date that they said they would be. I had to call the company to find out where they were, they did not inform me about anything. The tables even at the factory but they were being shipped to the factory and it took two weeks for the process. Once they were in the company was going to charge me double to come deliver because they had already delivered the mattress that I bought with the tables. I had to go pick up the tables and assemble them myself. You get what you pay for, cheap prices along with terrible service.
